ptolemy.vergil.basic.layout.kieler

Class Parameters

  • java.lang.Object
    • ptolemy.vergil.basic.layout.kieler.Parameters

  • public class Parameters
extends java.lang.Object
    Responsible for translating layout configuration parameters into the KIELER format. Parameters are read from an instance of the AbstractLayoutConfiguration attribute, which is attached to composite entities when the configuration dialog is opened.
    Since:
    Ptolemy II 10.0
    Author:
    Miro Spoenemann, Christoph Daniel Schulze, Ulf Rueegg
    See Also:
    AbstractLayoutConfiguration
    Pt.AcceptedRating:
    Red (msp)
    Pt.ProposedRating:
    Red (msp)

      Layout option for the aspect ratio of connected components.
      static de.cau.cs.kieler.core.properties.IProperty<java.lang.Boolean> DECORATIONS
      Layout option that determines whether decoration nodes are included in layout.
      static de.cau.cs.kieler.core.properties.IProperty<java.lang.Float> SPACING
      Layout option for the overall spacing between elements.
      static de.cau.cs.kieler.core.properties.IProperty<java.lang.Boolean> SPLINES
      Layout option that determines whether splines should be used for FSMs.

      • configureLayout

        public void configureLayout(de.cau.cs.kieler.kiml.klayoutdata.KShapeLayout parentLayout,

                     throws IllegalActionException
        Configure the KIELER layout using a property holder.
        Parameters:
        parentLayout - the layout of the parent node
        graphModel - the graph model of the current diagram
        Throws:
        IllegalActionException - if one of the parameters has the wrong type
